doc:
Anthony Quayle https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anthony_Quayle 0 Sir John Anthony Quayle, (7 September 1913 – 20 October 1989) was an English actor and theatre director. He was nominated for an Oscar and a Golden Globe for his supporting role as Thomas Wolsey in the 1969 film Anne of the Thousand Days, and played important roles in such major studio productions as The Guns of Navarone (1961), Lawrence of Arabia (1962), The Fall of the Roman Empire (1964), Operation Crossbow (1965), QB VII (1974), and The Eagle Has Landed (1976). Quayle was knighted in 1985. Sir_John_Anthony_Quayle , ( 7_September_1913 – 20_October_1989 ) was an_English_actor_and_theatre_director . He was_nominated for an_Oscar and a_Golden_Globe for his_supporting_role as Thomas_Wolsey in the_1969_film Anne of the_Thousand_Days , and played important_roles in such_major_studio_productions as The_Guns of Navarone_(_1961_) , Lawrence of Arabia_(_1962_) , The_Fall of the_Roman_Empire_(_1964_) , Operation_Crossbow_(_1965_)_,_QB_VII_(_1974_) , and The_Eagle Has_Landed (_1976_) . Quayle was_knighted in 1985 .
